short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans for Bible references and provides links to read them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whatever webpage you are reading, this extension will scan the page for Bible references and provide a hover menu to quickly link (in a new window) to the passage.
